name: Via Grid Generator
description: Automatically place ground vias in a grid pattern with DRC compliance
description_full:
A powerful KiCad plugin that automatically generates a grid of vias for ground plane stitching or thermal management. Features include:

• Configurable grid spacing and via parameters
• Automatic DRC compliance checking
• Board outline detection
• Clearance checking against pads, tracks, and existing vias
• Support for custom net selection
• Progress reporting for large grids
• Proper handling of complex board shapes

The plugin intelligently avoids existing components and traces while maximizing via coverage within the board outline.
